timeline.bodyText: Change to findFirst() so when we support multi-inheritance first project will be returned
timeline.author: rymsha

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/modules/core/core-api/src/main/java/com/enonic/xp/project/Projects.java b/modules/core/core-api/src/main/java/com/enonic/xp/project/Projects.java
index 936e8230e8..084ba9979d 100644
--- a/modules/core/core-api/src/main/java/com/enonic/xp/project/Projects.java
+++ b/modules/core/core-api/src/main/java/com/enonic/xp/project/Projects.java

@@ -43,7 +43,7 @@ public final class Projects
     {
         return this.stream().
             filter( project -> project.getName().equals( name ) ).
-            findAny().
+            findFirst().
             orElse( null );
     }
